text: Godɨn nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko an fofozimɨn, God kamaghɨn fo, nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba uan fofozimɨn tuavimɨn me Godɨn fofozim inighan kogham. Kamaghɨn, God tuavir igharazir mam men akuraghasa anemɨsefe. Kar, me “mɨgɨrɨgɨar onganim,” arazir akam, e anekuri. Gumazamiziba akar kam baragha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itima, God men akurvasi.
